title: How to Look Fabulous All the Time

steps.title: Be confident
steps.content: Be confident ! Stand tall and smile, or all of your hard work will go to waste. Never stand in a corner or try to avoid attention or no one will notice how fabulous you look.

steps.title: Have a clear face.
steps.content: Have a clear face. Use a product like Proactive if you have zits. Make sure to wash your face daily, and that you are free of acne before attempting the next step, or you could cause a break-out. Wash as often as you need, daily showers are the norm. No one will care how fabulous you look if you smell like sweat!

steps.title: Carry around a little make up pouch with you with your favorite products.
steps.content: Carry around a little make up pouch with you with your favorite products. In your make up pouch, you should have at least your eyeliner, blush, lip gloss and mascara. A comb or hairbrush helps too. Also keep some deodorant and chapstick just in case.

steps.title: Tie up your hair into a nice, cute ponytail or smooth it out before you step out of your house.
steps.content: Tie up your hair into a nice, cute ponytail or smooth it out before you step out of your house. Change your hairstyle every once in a while. Having the same hairstyle for the whole year can become a little dull and boring. Try a bun or braid to jazz things up. You can even go to the stylist and ask for a snip.

steps.title: Don't leave home without checking yourself in a mirror.
steps.content: Don't leave home without checking yourself in a mirror. Check the mirror every few hours - you could just use your make-up mirror. Don't try this during class, or you could get into trouble.

steps.title: Carry a big bag to put all of your essentials in.
steps.content: Carry a big bag to put all of your essentials in. It's easier to carry just one bag, except for your make up pouch, which can be put into your big bag, and it looks more stylish, too.

steps.title: If you do not need to wear a uniform, you don't need to wear the same outfits to school.
steps.content: If you do not need to wear a uniform, you don't need to wear the same outfits to school. Look at making a capsule wardrobe - a few pieces that can mix and match to many different outfits.

steps.title: Try accessories.
steps.content: Try accessories. Something simple like earrings, bangles, or a belt can change up a look from good to fabulous.

steps.title: Be true to yourself and your own style.
steps.content: Be true to yourself and your own style . Don't listen too much to other people's advice especially if it doesn't sound like it will work.

steps.title: Get a good night's sleep every night .
steps.content: Get a good night's sleep every night . This way you'll look fresh in the morning. Sleep also will reduce dark spots under the eyes.

steps.title: Smell nice.
steps.content: Smell nice. Shower in the morning and at night and wear perfume that you think smells great.
